mapper.select: SELECT a.account_no ,a.account_email AS accountEmail ,b.seq AS seq ,b.address AS address ,b.city AS city ,b.province AS province ,b.country AS country ,b.postal_cd AS postalCd ,b.is_default_address AS isDefalutAddress FROM account a LEFT OUTER JOIN account_address b ON b.account_no = a.account_no WHERE a.account_no = '1' order by is_default_address DESC, seq ASC
